title: Smoother DoT effects feel better to play with AND against
body:
I am a League player, but of course I play other games. And I noticed the best feeling DoTs in games are like Heroes of the Storm. Where the dot is a smooth, easy to read drain. Not a: 100... 100... 100... but instead: 10,10,10,10,10,10,10,10,10,10,10... etc.

I don't even play Singed, and the change to his poison made me soooooo happy. Like even playing against him it is so much easier to read and feels better to both beat and be beaten by.

Can we just... do this for all DoT effects? smooth them out to be more of a consistent drain or at least more rapid, smaller ticks? I think that would be amazing.
